verses.text: In those \w days|strong="H3117"\w* \add there was\add* no \w king|strong="H4428"\w* in \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*: and in those \w days|strong="H3117"\w* the \w tribe|strong="H7626"\w* of the \w Danites|strong="H1839"\w* \w sought|strong="H1245"\w* them an \w inheritance|strong="H5159"\w* to dwell \w in|strong="H3427"\w*; for unto that \w day|strong="H3117"\w* \add all their\add* \w inheritance|strong="H5159"\w* had not \w fallen|strong="H5307"\w* unto them \w among|strong="H8432"\w* the \w tribes|strong="H7626"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*.

And the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Dan|strong="H1835"\w* \w sent|strong="H7971"\w* of their \w family|strong="H4940"\w* \w five|strong="H2568"\w* \w men|strong="H0582"\w* from their \w coasts|strong="H7098"\w*, \w men|strong="H1121"\w* of \w valour|strong="H2428"\w*, from \w Zorah|strong="H6881"\w*, and from \w Eshtaol|strong="H0847"\w*, to \w spy|strong="H7270"\w* out the \w land|strong="H0776"\w*, and to \w search|strong="H2713"\w* it; and they \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto them, \w Go|strong="H3212"\w*, \w search|strong="H2713"\w* the \w land|strong="H0776"\w*: who when they \w came|strong="H0935"\w* to \w mount|strong="H2022"\w* \w Ephraim|strong="H0669"\w*, to the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of \w Micah|strong="H4318"\w*, they \w lodged|strong="H3885"\w* there.\f + \fr 18.2 \ft men of: Heb. sons of\f*

When they \add were\add* by the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of \w Micah|strong="H4318"\w*, they \w knew|strong="H5234"\w* the \w voice|strong="H6963"\w* of the young \w man|strong="H5288"\w* the \w Levite|strong="H3881"\w*: and they turned \w in|strong="H5493"\w* thither, and \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto him, Who \w brought|strong="H0935"\w* thee \w hither|strong="H1988"\w*? and what \w makest|strong="H6213"\w* thou in this \add place\add*? and what hast thou here?

And he \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto them, \w Thus|strong="H2090"\w* and \w thus|strong="H2090"\w* \w dealeth|strong="H6213"\w* \w Micah|strong="H4318"\w* with me, and hath \w hired|strong="H7936"\w* me, and I am his \w priest|strong="H3548"\w*.

And they \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto him, Ask \w counsel|strong="H7592"\w*, we pray thee, of \w God|strong="H0430"\w*, that we may \w know|strong="H3045"\w* whether our \w way|strong="H1870"\w* which we \w go|strong="H1980"\w* shall be \w prosperous|strong="H6743"\w*.

And the \w priest|strong="H3548"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto them, \w Go|strong="H3212"\w* in \w peace|strong="H7965"\w*: \w before|strong="H5227"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \add is\add* your \w way|strong="H1870"\w* wherein ye \w go|strong="H3212"\w*.

¶ Then the \w five|strong="H2568"\w* \w men|strong="H0582"\w* \w departed|strong="H3212"\w*, and \w came|strong="H0935"\w* to \w Laish|strong="H3919"\w*, and \w saw|strong="H7200"\w* the \w people|strong="H5971"\w* that \add were\add* \w therein|strong="H7130"\w*, how they \w dwelt|strong="H3427"\w* \w careless|strong="H0983"\w*, after the \w manner|strong="H4941"\w* of the \w Zidonians|strong="H6722"\w*, \w quiet|strong="H8252"\w* and \w secure|strong="H0982"\w*; and \add there was\add* no \w magistrate|strong="H3423"\w* in the \w land|strong="H0776"\w*, that might put \add them\add* to \w shame|strong="H3637"\w* in \add any\add* \w thing|strong="H1697"\w*; and they \add were\add* \w far|strong="H7350"\w* from the \w Zidonians|strong="H6722"\w*, and had no \w business|strong="H1697"\w* with \add any\add* \w man|strong="H0120"\w*.\f + \fr 18.7 \ft Laish: also called, Leshem\f*\f + \fr 18.7 \ft magistrate: Heb. possessor, or, heir of restraints\f*

And they \w came|strong="H0935"\w* unto their \w brethren|strong="H0251"\w* to \w Zorah|strong="H6881"\w* and \w Eshtaol|strong="H0847"\w*: and their \w brethren|strong="H0251"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto them, What \add say\add* ye?

And they \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, \w Arise|strong="H6965"\w*, that we may go \w up|strong="H5927"\w* against them: for we have \w seen|strong="H7200"\w* the \w land|strong="H0776"\w*, and, behold, it \add is\add* \w very|strong="H3966"\w* \w good|strong="H2896"\w*: and \add are\add* ye \w still|strong="H2814"\w*? be not \w slothful|strong="H6101"\w* to \w go|strong="H3212"\w*, \add and\add* to \w enter|strong="H0935"\w* to \w possess|strong="H3423"\w* the \w land|strong="H0776"\w*.

When ye \w go|strong="H0935"\w*, ye shall \w come|strong="H0935"\w* unto a \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w secure|strong="H0982"\w*, and to a \w large|strong="H7342"\w* \w land|strong="H0776"\w*: for \w God|strong="H0430"\w* hath \w given|strong="H5414"\w* it into your \w hands|strong="H3027"\w*; a \w place|strong="H4725"\w* where \add there is\add* no \w want|strong="H4270"\w* of any \w thing|strong="H1697"\w* that \add is\add* in the \w earth|strong="H0776"\w*.

¶ And there \w went|strong="H5265"\w* from thence of the \w family|strong="H4940"\w* of the \w Danites|strong="H1839"\w*, out of \w Zorah|strong="H6881"\w* and out of \w Eshtaol|strong="H0847"\w*, \w six|strong="H8337"\w* \w hundred|strong="H3967"\w* \w men|strong="H0376"\w* \w appointed|strong="H2296"\w* with \w weapons|strong="H3627"\w* of \w war|strong="H4421"\w*.\f + \fr 18.11 \ft appointed: Heb. girded\f*

And they went \w up|strong="H5927"\w*, and \w pitched|strong="H2583"\w* in \w Kirjath-jearim|strong="H7157"\w*, in \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w*: wherefore they \w called|strong="H7121"\w* that \w place|strong="H4725"\w* \w Mahaneh-dan|strong="H4265"\w* unto this \w day|strong="H3117"\w*: behold, \add it is\add* \w behind|strong="H0310"\w* \w Kirjath-jearim|strong="H7157"\w*.

And they \w passed|strong="H5674"\w* thence unto \w mount|strong="H2022"\w* \w Ephraim|strong="H0669"\w*, and \w came|strong="H0935"\w* unto the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of \w Micah|strong="H4318"\w*.

¶ Then \w answered|strong="H6030"\w* the \w five|strong="H2568"\w* \w men|strong="H0582"\w* that \w went|strong="H1980"\w* to spy \w out|strong="H7270"\w* the \w country|strong="H0776"\w* of \w Laish|strong="H3919"\w*, and \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto their \w brethren|strong="H0251"\w*, Do ye \w know|strong="H3045"\w* that there \w is|strong="H3426"\w* in these \w houses|strong="H1004"\w* an \w ephod|strong="H0646"\w*, and \w teraphim|strong="H8655"\w*, and a graven \w image|strong="H6459"\w*, and a molten \w image|strong="H4541"\w*? now therefore \w consider|strong="H3045"\w* what ye have to \w do|strong="H6213"\w*.

And they \w turned|strong="H5493"\w* thitherward, and \w came|strong="H0935"\w* to the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of the young \w man|strong="H5288"\w* the \w Levite|strong="H3881"\w*, \add even\add* unto the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of \w Micah|strong="H4318"\w*, and \w saluted|strong="H7592"\w* him.\f + \fr 18.15 \ft saluted…: Heb. asked him of peace\f*

And the \w six|strong="H8337"\w* \w hundred|strong="H3967"\w* \w men|strong="H0376"\w* \w appointed|strong="H2296"\w* with their \w weapons|strong="H3627"\w* of \w war|strong="H4421"\w*, which \add were\add* of the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Dan|strong="H1835"\w*, \w stood|strong="H5324"\w* by the \w entering|strong="H6607"\w* of the \w gate|strong="H8179"\w*.

And the \w five|strong="H2568"\w* \w men|strong="H0582"\w* that \w went|strong="H1980"\w* to spy \w out|strong="H7270"\w* the \w land|strong="H0776"\w* went \w up|strong="H5927"\w*, \add and\add* came \w in|strong="H0935"\w* thither, \add and\add* \w took|strong="H3947"\w* the graven \w image|strong="H6459"\w*, and the \w ephod|strong="H0646"\w*, and the \w teraphim|strong="H8655"\w*, and the molten \w image|strong="H4541"\w*: and the \w priest|strong="H3548"\w* \w stood|strong="H5324"\w* in the \w entering|strong="H6607"\w* of the \w gate|strong="H8179"\w* with the \w six|strong="H8337"\w* \w hundred|strong="H3967"\w* \w men|strong="H0376"\w* \add that were\add* \w appointed|strong="H2296"\w* with \w weapons|strong="H3627"\w* of \w war|strong="H4421"\w*.

And these \w went|strong="H0935"\w* into \w Micah’s|strong="H4318"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w*, and \w fetched|strong="H3947"\w* the carved \w image|strong="H6459"\w*, the \w ephod|strong="H0646"\w*, and the \w teraphim|strong="H8655"\w*, and the molten \w image|strong="H4541"\w*. Then \w said|strong="H0559"\w* the \w priest|strong="H3548"\w* unto them, What \w do|strong="H6213"\w* ye?

And they \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto him, Hold thy \w peace|strong="H2790"\w*, \w lay|strong="H7760"\w* thine \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* upon thy \w mouth|strong="H6310"\w*, and \w go|strong="H3212"\w* with us, and be to \w us|strong="H1961"\w* a \w father|strong="H0001"\w* and a \w priest|strong="H3548"\w*: \add is it\add* \w better|strong="H2896"\w* for thee to be a \w priest|strong="H3548"\w* unto the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of \w one|strong="H0259"\w* \w man|strong="H0376"\w*, or that thou be a \w priest|strong="H3548"\w* unto a \w tribe|strong="H7626"\w* and a \w family|strong="H4940"\w* in \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*?

And the \w priest’s|strong="H3548"\w* \w heart|strong="H3820"\w* was \w glad|strong="H3190"\w*, and he \w took|strong="H3947"\w* the \w ephod|strong="H0646"\w*, and the \w teraphim|strong="H8655"\w*, and the graven \w image|strong="H6459"\w*, and went \w in|strong="H0935"\w* the \w midst|strong="H7130"\w* of the \w people|strong="H5971"\w*.

So they \w turned|strong="H6437"\w* and \w departed|strong="H3212"\w*, and \w put|strong="H7760"\w* the little \w ones|strong="H2945"\w* and the \w cattle|strong="H4735"\w* and the \w carriage|strong="H3520"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* them.

¶ \add And\add* when they were a good \w way|strong="H7368"\w* from the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of \w Micah|strong="H4318"\w*, the \w men|strong="H0582"\w* that \add were\add* in the \w houses|strong="H1004"\w* near to \w Micah’s|strong="H4318"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w* were gathered \w together|strong="H2199"\w*, and \w overtook|strong="H1692"\w* the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Dan|strong="H1835"\w*.

And they \w cried|strong="H7121"\w* unto the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Dan|strong="H1835"\w*. And they \w turned|strong="H5437"\w* their \w faces|strong="H6440"\w*, and \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto \w Micah|strong="H4318"\w*, What aileth thee, that thou comest with such a \w company|strong="H2199"\w*?\f + \fr 18.23 \ft comest…: Heb. art gathered together?\f*

And he \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, Ye have taken \w away|strong="H3947"\w* my \w gods|strong="H0430"\w* which I \w made|strong="H6213"\w*, and the \w priest|strong="H3548"\w*, and ye are gone \w away|strong="H3212"\w*: and what have I more? and what \add is\add* this \add that\add* ye \w say|strong="H0559"\w* unto me, What aileth thee?

And the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Dan|strong="H1835"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto him, Let not thy \w voice|strong="H6963"\w* be \w heard|strong="H8085"\w* among us, lest \w angry|strong="H4751"\w* \w fellows|strong="H0582"\w* \w run|strong="H6293"\w* upon thee, and thou \w lose|strong="H0622"\w* thy \w life|strong="H5315"\w*, with the \w lives|strong="H5315"\w* of thy \w household|strong="H1004"\w*.\f + \fr 18.25 \ft angry: Heb. bitter of soul\f*

And the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Dan|strong="H1835"\w* \w went|strong="H3212"\w* their \w way|strong="H1870"\w*: and when \w Micah|strong="H4318"\w* \w saw|strong="H7200"\w* that they \add were\add* too \w strong|strong="H2389"\w* for him, he \w turned|strong="H6437"\w* and went \w back|strong="H7725"\w* unto his \w house|strong="H1004"\w*.

And they \w took|strong="H3947"\w* \add the things\add* which \w Micah|strong="H4318"\w* had \w made|strong="H6213"\w*, and the \w priest|strong="H3548"\w* which he had, and \w came|strong="H0935"\w* unto \w Laish|strong="H3919"\w*, unto a \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \add that were\add* at \w quiet|strong="H8252"\w* and \w secure|strong="H0982"\w*: and they \w smote|strong="H5221"\w* them with the \w edge|strong="H6310"\w* of the \w sword|strong="H2719"\w*, and \w burnt|strong="H8313"\w* the \w city|strong="H5892"\w* with \w fire|strong="H0784"\w*.

And \add there was\add* no \w deliverer|strong="H5337"\w*, because it \add was\add* \w far|strong="H7350"\w* from \w Zidon|strong="H6721"\w*, and they had no \w business|strong="H1697"\w* with \add any\add* \w man|strong="H0120"\w*; and it was in the \w valley|strong="H6010"\w* that \add lieth\add* by \w Beth-rehob|strong="H1050"\w*. And they \w built|strong="H1129"\w* a \w city|strong="H5892"\w*, and \w dwelt|strong="H3427"\w* therein.

And they \w called|strong="H7121"\w* the \w name|strong="H8034"\w* of the \w city|strong="H5892"\w* \w Dan|strong="H1835"\w*, after the \w name|strong="H8034"\w* of \w Dan|strong="H1835"\w* their \w father|strong="H0001"\w*, who was \w born|strong="H3205"\w* unto \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*: \w howbeit|strong="H0199"\w* the \w name|strong="H8034"\w* of the \w city|strong="H5892"\w* \add was\add* \w Laish|strong="H3919"\w* at the \w first|strong="H7223"\w*.

¶ And the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Dan|strong="H1835"\w* set \w up|strong="H6965"\w* the graven \w image|strong="H6459"\w*: and \w Jonathan|strong="H3083"\w*, the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Gershom|strong="H1647"\w*, the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Manasseh|strong="H4519"\w*, he and his \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* were \w priests|strong="H3548"\w* to the \w tribe|strong="H7626"\w* of \w Dan|strong="H1839"\w* until the \w day|strong="H3117"\w* of the \w captivity|strong="H1540"\w* of the \w land|strong="H0776"\w*.

And they set them \w up|strong="H7760"\w* \w Micah’s|strong="H4318"\w* graven \w image|strong="H6459"\w*, which he \w made|strong="H6213"\w*, all the \w time|strong="H3117"\w* that the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of \w God|strong="H0430"\w* was in \w Shiloh|strong="H7887"\w*.
